price: Haitakuwa ila ukelele mmoja tu, mara wote watahudhuruishwa mbele yetu.
arabic: إِن كَانَتۡ إِلَّا صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ فَإِذَا هُمۡ جَمِيعٞ لَّدَيۡنَا مُحۡضَرُونَ
footnotes: Wito wao wa kuwatoa hautakuwa ila ukelele mmoja tu, mara wote watakusanywa mbele yetu wahudhurishwe ili tuwahisabie.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: in kānat illā ṣayḥatan wāḥidatan fa-idhā hum jamīʿun ladaynā muḥ'ḍarūna
